generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the edges of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the roadside and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including those mounted on poles and attached to buildings.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road and some are in motion on the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
